title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Parallel Argumentation Design Workshop for Developing Scientific Argumentation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design parallel argumentation structures that integrate diverse perspectives on scientific issues
Learners can write multi-layered argumentative essays including counterarguments through collaborative activities with peers
Learners can evaluate evidence-based logical arguments on scientific issues such as genetic phenomena

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
